I can render complex 4K projects in half the time it took on my previous Intel Mac. The Space Black finish is sleek and surprisingly resistant to fingerprints.', 'Best laptop screen I have ever seen. The 120Hz ProMotion makes everything feel butter-smooth, and the battery life actually lasts a full workday even with heavy Lightroom use.', 'It is a massive investment, but for professional video work, it pays for itself in saved time. The speakers are also surprisingly deep and clear for a laptop.']}, 'ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16 (2025) GA605': {'price': 2545.0, 'brand': 'ASUS', 'category': 'Electronics', 'product_id': 'P035', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ["If you're looking for a 'MacBook for gamers,' this is the perfect choice. The G16 feels incredibly solid and the 240Hz OLED screen is spectacular for both editing and high-speed gaming.", "The new slash lighting on the lid is subtle but cool. It handles heavy creative software easily, though the fans can get a bit loud when you're pushing the RTX 5070 to its limit.", 'Nicer than I expected for a gaming rig. The Ceraluminum finish is smooth and premium. It’s light enough to carry to meetings but has the power to run any AAA title I throw at it.']}, 'SoundWave Elite Wireless': {'price': 299.0, 'brand': 'SoundWave', 'category': 'Electronics', but the plastic feels a bit cheap and creaks when I move.", 'The Bluetooth connection drops occasionally if I put my phone in my back pocket.', 'Sound quality is average, lacks bass, but works fine for listening to podcasts.', 'Battery life is shorter than advertised, lasted about 5 hours instead of 10.']}, 'ViewPlus OmniBook Pro 14': {'price': 1499.0, 'brand': 'ViewPlus', 'category': 'Electronics', 'product_id': 'P044', 'rating': 4.7, 'reviews': ['The 3K OLED screen is absolute perfection for color-critical work. 120Hz makes the whole UI feel incredibly responsive.', 'Solid aluminum build that rivals the MacBook Pro, but with the flexibility of Windows. The haptic touchpad is a joy to use.', 'Performance is top-tier; it handles 4K video editing and large datasets without breaking a sweat or getting too loud.', 'For $1499, getting 32GB of RAM and this level of display is a fantastic value compared to other flagship models.']}, 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse': {'price': 180.0, 'brand': 'TechBrand', 'category': 'Electronics', 'product_id': 'P045', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ['The silent click is actually silent! The paracord cable is so light it almost feels wireless.', 'The sensor is incredibly accurate for flick shots in Valorant.', 'The RGB software is easy to use and syncs perfectly with my KeyMaster keyboard.']}}
